quotes: You can remove or revise this information at any time.
We also store your user account preferences and settings.
information about your activity on our Services and limited information about your activity on the services of advertisers who use our advertising technology.
We collect information about the actions you take when using the Services.

you may have: the right to opt out of any sales or sharing of your personal information, to request access to and information about our data practices, and to request deletion or correction of your personal information
Reddit does not sell or share personal information as those terms are defined under the CCPA or other applicable regulations.
We may receive information about you from other sources, including from other users and third parties, and combine that information with the other information we have about you.
Reddit does not sell or share personal information as those terms are defined under the CCPA or other applicable regulations.

Depending on your jurisdiction, and subject to exceptions and limitations provided by local law, in addition to the rights listed in Your Rights and Choices above, you may have: the right to opt out of any sales or sharing of your personal information
you may have the right to request access to and information about our data practices, and to request deletion or correction of your personal information
You can control how we use this information to personalize advertisements for you by visiting the User Settings menu in your account
We also store your user account preferences and settings.
Reddit uses industry-standard payment processor services(such as Stripe) to handle payment information, and those services are subject to separate terms and conditions and privacy policies.
We collect information about the actions you take when using the Services.
Reddit's Anti-Slavery and Human Trafficking Statement
Transparency Guidelines for Law Enforcement
You can find more information about(a) what we collect and sources of that information in the What Information We Collect section of this notice
We may receive information about you from other sources, including from other users and third parties, and combine that information with the other information we have about you.
Public content you submit includes your public posts, comments, and chat messages, usernames, and some of your profile information, as well as related metadata.
Non-public content you submit includes your saved drafts of posts or comments, your non-public messages with other users

metadata.additional_notes: Reddit's terms and conditions seem to be mostly GDPR compliant, with clear explanations of data collection and user rights. However, some sections could be more transparent, such as the terms changes and security measures.
